Translations.Text: Bar jakdigar pesi gired ʙaroi omurzisi Parvardigori xes va rasidan ʙa on ʙihist, ki pahnojas ʙa qadri hamai osmonhovu zamin ast va ʙaron parhezgoron muxajjo sudaast
on kason, ki dar tavongarivu tangdasti ehson mekunand va xasmi xud furu mexurand va az xatoi mardum darmeguzarand. Xudo nakukoronro dust dorad

Va on kason, ki cun kore zist kunand jo ʙa xud sitame kunand, Xudoro jod mekunand va ʙaroi gunohoni xes omurzis mexohand va kist cuz Xudo, ki gunohonro ʙijomurzad? Va cun ʙa zistii gunoh ogohand, dar on ci mekardand, poj nafusurand
Cazoi inho omurzisi Parvardigorason ast va niz ʙihisthoe ki dar on nahrho corist. Dar on co covidonand va ci nekust cazoi nekukoron
Pes az sumo voqe'ahoe ʙudaast, pas ʙar rui zamin ʙigarded va ʙingared, ki pojoni kori onho, pajomʙaronro ʙa duruƣgui nisʙat medodand, ci ʙudaast
In ʙaroi mardum dalele ravsan va ʙaroi parhezgoron rohnamovu pandest
Susti makuned va anduhgin maʙosed, zero agar imon ovarda ʙosed, sumo ƣoliʙ hasted

Agar ʙar sumo zaxme rasid, ʙa on qavm niz hamcunon zaxme rasidaast. Va in ruzgor ast, ki har dam onro ʙar murodi kase megardonem, to Xudo kasonero, ki imon ovardaand, ʙisinosad va az sumo guvohon girad. Va Xudo sitamkoronro dust nadorad
